Household and business map

Number of households and businesses by region

Household and business map

Adjust the number of households (h_holds) and number of businesses (bus_cnt) with the widget on the left side.

  • Map information
  • Application:
  • CartoDB
  • Base map:
  • OpenStreetMap
  • Layer(s):
  • SHP
  • Purpose:
  • Showcase the number of households and businesses by region.

Created with the Jekyll static site generator, written in the Ruby programming language. The site generation is implemented in the Liquid template language. Hosted on Github Pages, the layout is based on Bootstrap and jQuery and inspired by the Clean blog Bootstrap theme by David Miller.
